Pre-Game Insights: Zambia is going all out against Morocco in their must-win and final 2023 AFCON Group F match.
Chipolopolo face The Atlas Lions in a boom-or-bust fixture that will see them either stay or make an early departure from the AFCON.
Zambia is eager to redeem itself after 1-1 drawâ€™s in their opening two Group F fixtures against DR Congo and Tanzania.
The team has overcome many challenges together before so this is another one, they are going to have to give their everything.
They know they are going to have to be at their best to be in with a chance but they will focus on the next game and yeah, they are going to give it everything.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chipolopolo and The Atlas Lions have had two previous AFCON meetings where Morocco have an edge with one win and a draw.
Zambia lost 1-0 at Egypt 1986 and drew 1-1 at Burkina Faso 1998 and in both matches, Chipolopolo made group stage exits
Others: Zambia's qualification to the last 16 is dependent on clinching one of the four best third place finishers slots.
Others in the third best race are hosts Ivory Coast, Algeria, Namibia, Cameroon together with Ghana who despite finishing on 2 points were by press time in with an outside chance.
